timeline.bodyText: I wonder if these should actually be instance local, and if we should have the Optimizer and SessionRegistry use the same instance. Otherwise in our tests where we simulate multiple nodes  within the same JVM we will have session settings shared across nodes. So our tests won't reflect real-world scenarios.

timeline.bodyText: The idea behind this is, to add more providers for other session settings.

timeline.bodyText: Could the loadedrules.rules(rulesToInclude) call be done on the call-site? The call-site already has both components available. It would have the advantage that the Optimizer could be more easily unit-tested as the dependencies stay smaller.
